title: EGGSTOCK22
description: Ticket to win one of the official EGGSTOCK heroes. Janis Yolklin, Jimi Hendreggs and Poster EGG. Every participant will receive a consolation prize if they dont win.

title: DUDEGGS
description: Prizes are three ArbiDudes handpicked by the creator or three custom made Hall of EGGFAMs inspired by ArbiDudes. Specially crafted consolation prize if you don't win, also inspired by ArbiDudes.

title: DONKEGGS
description: EEEEEEGHAAAAAAAW. Never gonna EGG you up. Never gonna BROCC you down. Never gonna run around and BAWK BAWK you. 5 Donkeys, 4 Hall of EGGFAMs and 5 chances to win 10% of the $MAGIC earnings of this EGGSGIVING.

title: ASTRO YOLKS

title: EGGBOTS
